concept.title: Market segments
concept.shortdesc: A market segment is a subset of your customer base. You can use a segment to restrict the results of a path report to show only the activity of customers who belong to the segment.

conbody.p: The segments available for use in can come from multiple sources. You can use segments that receives from providers who share this information through IBM Universal Behavior Exchange (UBX). You can also use segments that you or other users create from the results of path reports.
For more information about how segment information from other providers is shared with , see the IBM Universal Behavior Exchange (UBX) documentation.
